nodes.excerpt: VectorIcons Mixer is a simple online tool that allows you to mix & match thousands of vector icons with colorful shapes to generate new icon sets with a few clicks. There are lots of icon styles & hundreds of abstract, geometric & organic shapes to combine!
nodes.title: VectorIcons Mixer by Iconshock - Get thousands of free icon variations using colorful shapes

nodes.excerpt: Going into the Firefox redesign, our team studied how people interact with the browser, observing their patterns and behaviors. We listened to feedback and gathered ideas from regular people who just want to have an easier experience on the web.
nodes.title: Firefox 89 - Modern, clean Firefox clears the way to your online needs
nodes.author: Adithya Shreshti

nodes.excerpt: OpenPhone is an all-in-one business phone for startups. It comes with powerful calling, messaging, and a lightweight CRM. It allows you to share a phone number with your team and collaborate on conversations. Available on mobile, web, and desktop.
nodes.title: OpenPhone for Teams - The all-in-one business phone, now made collaborative
nodes.author: Todd Goldberg

nodes.excerpt: NutriSense is a data-driven metabolic health platform that tracks key metabolic markers in real-time. Using continuous glucose monitoring, AI-powered meal tracking, and expert coaching, they help you hit your health goals and create lasting behavior change.
nodes.title: NutriSense V2.0 - Discover and reach your health potential
nodes.author: jason

nodes.excerpt: Day Zero is community for aspiring founders and serial builders to explore new ideas, and work alongside a community to bring them to life. We provide tools and a workflow to ideate and validate new ideas so you're next big thing doesn't stay inside your head.
nodes.title: Day Zero by Day One - Community for exploring and validating new business ideas
nodes.author: Andrew William Hutton

nodes.excerpt: TickTick is an all-in-one productivity app that is simple to use. It helps people get the most out of their life by managing to-dos, scheduling on a calendar, taking notes, and staying focused all in one place.
nodes.title: TickTick 6.0 - Not only efficient, but also more personalized than ever

nodes.excerpt: Success in growth requires skills across disciplines ranging from product management and data to customer acquisition and experiment design. This 45-minute growth skills assessment will help you understand your strengths and blindspots across growth skills.
nodes.title: Growth Skills Assessment Test - Rate yourself across key skills for driving growth
